basic.name: Daniel Lang
basic.summary: Full-stack Software Engineer with experience modernizing large-scale enterprise systems and enhancing application performance. Skilled in React, TypeScript, and Java.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.summary: Full-stack development (React/Typescript and Java) focusing on modernizing legacy systems and supporting high-scale backend services
details: Modernized legacy central management dashboard using React and Typescript
Reduced build time from 2.5 hours to 20 minutes by removing circular dependencies and adjusting build configuration settings
Introduced Redux Toolkit Query to replace manual data fetching via useEffect, reducing bugs and improving developer experience
Implemented new payment type on the Order Management System (Java/Spring) for Fare Not Paid Invoices allowing users to pay unpaid fares at a later time
Collaborated across multiple Java microservices to support new REST APIs, order flows, and data validations for the company’s backend order system with over 30 million daily users worldwide

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.summary: Primarily backend Java development across a wide variety of insurance domains
details: Served as primary developer for an Auto Liability Reporting system (Java/Spring), enhancing compliant policy reporting through an automated nightly batch job
Implemented feature allowing business users to retire Workers Compensation holds via UI, removing need for devs to run manual DB scripts which require manager and DB admin approval
Contributed to a variety of projects, including rating inputs, workers’ compensation, and front-end enhancements, adapting rapidly across domains

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
